Runkeeper: You & I & the UI

By Felicia Zhang on November 14, 2017

Runkeeper joined us this week to give a presentation about creating good UI design. They gave some great tips on how to make sure your design is flexible and inclusive, from constructing versatile layouts to accommodating for multiple languages. Check out their presentation here.
